name: HomeServiceManager
0:
”Alexa, open Home Service Manager”
”Alexa, ask Home Service Manager what is the status of my dishwasher claim”
”Alexa, tell Home Service Manager my refrigerator is broken”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home service manager
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can manage your home service plan with Amazon Echo, Echo Dot or Echo Show. Whether you want to know what’s covered, submit a claim or check status, #JustAsk Alexa.

Open the skill, then say what you need.
Start with, “Alexa, open Home Service Manager.” 
Then, you might try:

Coverage:
“Is my refrigerator covered?”
“What’s covered by my plan?”
“Does my warranty cover my water heater?”

Claims:
“Submit a claim for my furnace.”
“My dishwasher is broken.”
“I need to place a claim for my air conditioner.”

Service:
“When’s my service appointment?”
“Who is the service provider for my claim?”
“I need to contact my service provider.”

Payments:
“How much is my deductible?”
"How much is my premium?"

for more information please go to www.cchs.com/Alexa.
